name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Engineer with 13+ years of experience in cloud-native software development, specializing in **AWS**, **GCP**, and **Azure**. Proficient in **infrastructure automation** and multi-cloud deployments, with demonstrated ability to implement **Kubernetes**, **Controller-Runtime**, and **Kubebuilder** for optimal system performance and scalability. Skilled in **collaboration**, problem-solving, and applying creativity to develop innovative solutions. 
Strong background as a Full Stack Developer with expertise in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, with comprehensive knowledge in frontend and backend development frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Experienced in building AI/ML-powered platforms supporting predictive analytics and real-time processing while aligning with compliance standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Proven capabilities in MLOps utilizing **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
